attributes.action: Make all MP's in Leave constituencies uphold the wishes of their constituencies.
attributes.background: With Brexit Day looming and no deal being agreed in Parliament, MP's in Leave constituencies should be held accountable for voting against the wishes of their constituents. All these MP's constituencies who have voted against the Deal put forward and against a No Deal a By Election should be called.

rejection.details:
We not sure exactly how you'd like MPs to be made to uphold the wishes of their constituents. There's already a petition calling for constituents to be allowed to recall and remove MPs by way of a by-election which you might like to sign if it calls for something you'd like to happen. You're more likely to get action on this issue if you sign and share a single petition.

 https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/270324
